      • sendWithWorker

        public void sendWithWorker​(RouteX routeX,
                           int retries)
        Sends a routeX with a worker in another thread. Checks retries * 3 times if any incoming RouteX matches this routeX (like: Message -> Acknowledge)
        Parameters:
        routeX - Any RouteX
        retries - How often should this routeX be sent
